name: Smart Quantum Game
description: Smart Quantum Game (SQMG) is an innovative Web3 gaming platform combining advanced Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain technology, and immersive gameplay inspired by open-world experiences like GTA. In SQMG, players explore a vast cyberpunk metropolis, managing evolving AI-driven agents represented by dynamic NFTs. These intelligent agents autonomously interact, learn, and strategically engage in missions and combat, generating value continuously—even when players are offline. More than just a game, SQMG offers a deep, interactive simulation where each player's decisions directly shape the narrative, economy, and evolution of a decentralized digital city. No grinding, no wasted time—just pure strategy, progress, and real rewards.
